text: Gabriela Alejandra Rivadeneira Burbano (born 25 July 1983) is an Ecuadorian politician. She was President of the National Assembly of Ecuador between May 2013 and May 2017. She was Governor of Imbabura Province from 2011 to 2012. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Quito Category:Presidents of the National Assembly of Ecuador Category:Imbabura Province
title: Gabriela Rivadeneira
